Player History
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/1965...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1966 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/15/1966 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Released by Texas on 6/23/1968...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/20/1969 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 7/1/1969 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/28/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/24/1971 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/9/1971 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/10/1976, off Ramon Hernandez (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/21/1977, off Brent Strom (BOS)...
Released by Texas on 4/1/1978...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/8/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1985...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Houston on 4/18/1986 (Going to HOU: LF D. Justice, C M. Salas. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF L. Dykstra, 2B W. Backman, P D. Rozema)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1988, off John Stuper (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1988, off Jack McDowell (LA)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Atlanta on 7/25/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1988, hitting .545 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Philadelphia on 8/10/1988...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1988, hitting .286 with 23 HR, 111 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/15/1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against San Francisco on 7/24/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1991, hitting .750 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1991, hitting .412 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 9/14/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1992, hitting .577 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 5/15/1993...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/29/1995...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1995, hitting .359 with 6 HR, 29 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles on 10/2/1995...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
Won MVP Award in 1995, hitting .320 with 33 HR, 118 RBI...
Injured on 4/16/1996 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
